recipesJson.name: Banana Nut Creme Cake
recipesJson.author: Daytimefrank1
recipesJson.description: Sweeten to taste. Picture a banana creme brûlée cooked inside a banana nut bread bowl. Rich and creamy. The creme brûlée base is all Tootall’s. Subs for Flavor Revolution Banana: FLV banana at .5% WF banana purée at 1% MB soft banana at 1% would be my picks. Mix, enjoy, and review.
